channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Virtualization 4

item.title: CVE-2024-7259|2024-09-26T15:50:53.467Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20virtualization%204
item.description: A flaw was found in oVirt. A user with administrator privileges, including users with the ReadOnlyAdmin permission, may be able to use browser developer tools to view Provider passwords in cleartext.
